title: Fantastic Kindred...ish Art :)
body:
A while ago I found the below image and intended to use it as a background for my phone, couldn't make it work the way I wanted and then subsequently forgot about it. Scrolling bored through my misc images folder today only to find it again and it made my day much better because it made me think immediately of Kindred. And there are more! Not League related art but what a great artist.

https://www.facebook.com/chiarabautistaartwork/photos/a.558941394158718.1073741828.558917134161144/815786341807554/?type=1&theater

Sharing is caring! :D

_PS: Kindred OCE skin ideas incoming._
